verses.verse: Now <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H87>Abram's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> bore him no <S%H3205>children:<s%> <S%H3808><s%> and she had an <S%H8198>handmaid,<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H1904>Hagar.<s%>

And <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6113>restrained<s%> me from <S%H4480>bearing:<s%> <S%H3205><s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> my <S%H8198>maid;<s%> it may <S%H194>be<s%> that I may obtain <S%H1129>children<s%> <S%H4480>by<s%> her. And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8297>Sarai.<s%>

And <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H87>Abram's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> her <S%H8198>maid<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> <S%H4480>after<s%> <S%H7093><s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> had <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> her to her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> to be his <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And he went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1904>Hagar,<s%> and she <S%H2029>conceived:<s%> and when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> she had <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> her <S%H1404>mistress<s%> was <S%H7043>despised<s%> in her <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H87>Abram,<s%> My <S%H2555>wrong<s%> be <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee: <S%H595>I<s%> have <S%H5414>given<s%> my <S%H8198>maid<s%> into thy <S%H2436>bosom;<s%> and when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> she had <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> I was <S%H7043>despised<s%> in her <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and thee.

But <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> thy <S%H8198>maid<s%> is in thy <S%H3027>hand;<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to her as it <S%H2896>pleaseth<s%> <S%H5869><s%> thee. And when <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> dealt <S%H6031>hardly<s%> with her, she <S%H1272>fled<s%> from her <S%H4480>face.<s%> <S%H6440><s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> her <S%H5921>by<s%> a <S%H5869>fountain<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H5869>fountain<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H7793>Shur.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1904>Hagar,<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai's<s%> <S%H8198>maid,<s%> <S%H335>whence<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H935>camest<s%> thou? and <S%H575>whither<s%> wilt thou <S%H1980>go?<s%> And she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H1272>flee<s%> from the <S%H4480>face<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of my <S%H1404>mistress<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, <S%H7725>Return<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thy <S%H1404>mistress,<s%> and submit <S%H6031>thyself<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> her <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, I will multiply thy seed <S%H7235>exceedingly,<s%> <S%H7235><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2233><s%> that it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H5608>numbered<s%> for <S%H4480>multitude.<s%> <S%H7230><s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> thou art with <S%H2030>child,<s%> and shalt <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and shalt <S%H7121>call<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H413><s%> thy <S%H6040>affliction.<s%>

And <S%H1931>he<s%> will <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H120>man;<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> will be against every <S%H3605>man,<s%> and every <S%H3605>man's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> against him; and he shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H5921>presence<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H251>brethren.<s%>

And she <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, <S%H859>Thou<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7210>seest<s%> me: <S%H3588>for<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> Have I <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1988>here<s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him that <S%H7200>seeth<s%> me?

Wherefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H875>well<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H883>Beer-lahai-roi;<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it is <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> and <S%H1260>Bered.<s%>
